headline: Nike plans to cut hundreds of jobs amid automation push
summary: Nike is planning to cut 775 jobs at distribution centers in Tennessee and Mississippi, amid the sportswear giant's push to boost efficiency and deploy automation.

headline: Nike to Cut 775 Workers at U.S. Distribution Centers as it Ramps Up Automation
summary: The layoffs, which amount to about 1% of Nike’s overall workforce, are part of the company’s efforts to strengthen and streamline operations.

headline: Nike to Cut 775 Jobs in Move to Consolidate U.S. Distribution Centers
summary: The cuts affect employees across facilities in Tennessee and Mississippi.

headline: Nike says it is investigating possible data breach
summary: Nike says it is investigating a potential data breach, ​after a group known for cyber attacks reportedly claimed to ‌have leaked a trove of data related to its business operations.  "We always take consumer ‌privacy and data security very seriously," Nike said in a statement.  The ransomware group World Leaks said on its website that it had ⁠published 1.4 terabytes of data ‌from Nike.

headline: Nike to cut 775 employees as it accelerates 'automation' at U.S. distribution centers
summary: Nike is cutting 775 employees, primarily from jobs at distribution centers in Tennessee and Mississippi.
